TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SaveFormsData extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Wordprocessing.OnOffType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is w:saveFormsData.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)]
`saveFormsData (Only Save Form Field Content)`
This element specifies that saving the contents of this document shall only save the contents of WordprocessingML form fields defined using the *FORMTEXT*, *FORMCHECKBOX*, and *FORMDROPDOWN* field codes in a comma-delimited text format which does not conform to /IEC 29500 (i.e. it is a one-way export from a WordprocessingML document).
[*Rationale*: This setting is typically used to allow duplication of paper forms in electronic WordprocessingML document form, allowing the resulting content to be extracted as a comma-delimited text file. *end rationale*]
If this element is omitted, then the contents of the entire document (not just form fields) should be saved according to the definition of WordprocessingML in /IEC 29500.
[*Example*: Consider a WordprocessingML document which has form fields in the top right and bottom left corners of the first page, as follows (with the text box form fields shaded in grey):
78f14fa1-8313-45b5-b888-638284f0670e
If the only content which must be saved are the form fields' contents, this requirement is specified using the following WordprocessingML in the document settings:
```xml <w:saveFormsData w:val="true" /> ```
The saveFormsData element's val attribute as a value of *true*, specifying that only form field data must be saved, resulting in output as follows in a text file:
```xml one,two ```
*end example*]
|Parent Elements| |---------------------| |settings (§17.15.1.78)|
This element’s content model is defined by the common boolean property definition in §17.17.4.
[!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
